subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard may already be the most physically imposing player in the N.B.A., but his sheer dominance obscures an inconvenient truth: his game is raw, his repertory incomplete.
snippet: Dwight Howard may already be the most physically imposing player in the N.B.A., but his sheer dominance obscures an inconvenient truth: his game is raw, his repertory incomplete.
